attributes.action: throw the book at Arsenal and Chelsea football clubs for their players behaviour in the League Cup final.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: why should we have to pay good money to watch these overpaid yobs disgracing themselves and bringing the game into disrepute in this way. They must be hit where it hurts - in the pocket!

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
